title: What would be required to begin colonizing an Earth like planet? (Assuming we have the technology to reach said planet) - Quora

response.answer_text: What would be required to begin colonizing an Earth like planet? (Assuming we have the technology to reach said planet) With or without life forms? It SHOULD be avoided if it has life forms… Without life forms: determine why they are missingcomplete resource surveys (which might answer why)determine what would be needed for a self supporting colony, and where those resources would come from, how they could be delivered if not on the planet to start with (such as it missing water, atmosphere…)determine how to remove incompatible elements (like too much sulfur as on Venus).The first steps are always to determine if the planet can support a colony, and how it can support a colony, what is missing and how to get what is missing, how to remove what is too much…
